what_you_need_to_know.title: What you need to know right now

questions.title: Do I really need a car accident lawyer in California?
questions.content: Yes. Without legal representation, you risk accepting far less than your case is worth. We level the playing field.

questions.title: How long do I have to file a car accident claim in California?
questions.content:
• Up to 2 years for personal injury
  • Only 6 months for claims involving government entities

questions.title: What if I don’t have health insurance?
questions.content: No problem—we connect you with trusted doctors and medical providers.

questions.title: What compensations am I Eligible For
questions.content:
Economic Damages:

  • Emergency room and long-term medical care
  • Lost wages or reduced earning ability
  • Property damage repair or replacement

Non-Economic Damages:

  • Pain and suffering
  • Emotional trauma
  • Loss of enjoyment of life
